#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t-->0)
	{
		long int a,b;
		cin>>a;
		cin>>b;
		long int ans=0;
		int num1=a;
		int num2=b;
		while((num1%10)!=0 and num1<=num2)
		{  // cout<<num1<<"   "<<ans<<endl;
			long int temp=num1;
			long int ans1=0;
			while(temp!=0)
			{
				int a=temp%10;
				if(a%2==0)
				ans1+=(2*a);
				else
				ans1+=a;
				temp=temp/10;
			}
			ans+=(ans1%10);
			num1++;
		}
		if(num1>num2)
		{
			cout<<ans<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		//cout<<"showing middle co"<<endl;
		ans+=(((num2-num1)/10)*45);
		num1+=(((num2-num1)/10)*10);
		//while((num2-num1)>9)
		//{
		//	ans+=45;
			//num1+=10;
			//cout<<ans<<"    "<<num1<<endl;
		//}
		//cout<<"half done"<<num1<<endl;
		while(num1<=b)
		{
			long int temp=num1;
			long int ans1=0;
			while(temp!=0)
			{
				int a=temp%10;
				if(a%2==0)
				ans1+=(2*a);
				else
				ans1+=a;
				temp=temp/10;
			}
			ans+=(ans1%10);
			num1++;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}}
